text: Jean Miotte (1926 - 1 March 2016) was a French abstract painter. He worked with the style known as L'Art Informel. He was born in Paris. Miotte's work is preserved and studied at the Miotte Foundation in Manhattan. Moitte died in New York City, New York at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *Examples of Jean Miotte's work *Miotte biography and original prints *Home of Miotte Foundation Category:1926 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French painters Category:Artists from Paris
title: Jean Miotte
